Translations.Text: Mu sa que yi daizhe mingzhengdaoda nimen, ranhou, zai ta likai shi, nimen jing chongbai niudu, nimen shi bu yi zhe.

Dangshi, wo yu nimen xiangyue, wo ba shan sheng dao nimen shangmian [bing shuo]:“Nimen dang jianchi wo suo ciyu nimen de [jingdian], dang qingting [wo de qishi].” Tamen shuo:“Women tingjianle, dan women bu fucong.” Youyu tamen bu xinyang, bai niudu yi jinru tamen de xinzhong. Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen de xinyang mingling nimen de zhen kebei! Jiaru nimen shi xinshi.”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Jiaru an la nali houshi de zhuzhai shi nimen suo zhuan you de, bieren wu fen, name, nimen jiu qiqiu siwang ba! Jiaru nimen shi chengshi zhe.”
Dan tamen jue bu hui yin ziji qinshou suo fan de zui'e er qiqiu siwang. An la dui bu yi zhe shi quanzhi de.

Ni bi jiang faxian tamen shi zui tansheng de ren, bingqie sheng yu bai ouxiang zhe, tamen mei ren dou xiwang shouming qiannian. Jishi ta shouming qiannian, ta ye wufa taotuo ying shou de xingfa. Fanshi tamen suozuo de, an la shi quan shi de.

Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Yu ji bu li lei tianshi [zhu] wei di zhe, zhi yin ta feng'an la zhi ming ba qishi [“gulanjing”] jiang zai ni xinzhong, yi zhengshi ciqian jiang shi de jingdian [ru “tao la te” he “yin ji lei”], zhe shi xinshimen de zhinan he xixun.
Shei yu an la ji qi tianshi, shizhe, ji bu li lei [tianshi] he mi ka lei [tianshi] wei di, an la bi yu zhexie bu xinyang zhe wei di.”
Wo que yi jiang shi ni [mu sheng] xuduo mingxian de jixiang [ru “gulanjing” jing wen], wei beini zhe cai hui fouren ta.
Mei dang tamen dijie yi xiang mengyue, tamen zhong bu jiu youxie ren paoqi ta ma? Qishi, tamen da duoshu ren bing bu xinyang.

Dang an la nali de yi wei shizhe [mu sheng] jianglin tamen, yi zhengshi tamen yi you de [jingdian] shi, shou ci jingdian de renmen [you jing ren] zhong youxie ren jiu ba an la de jingdian zhi zhi nao hou, haoxiang tamen zhen de bu zhidao yiyang.

Tamen zunxing emomen fandui su lai man wangquan suo zuo de wangyan. Su lai man bingfei bu xinyang, er shi emomen bu xinyang. Tamen jiaoshou renmen moshu [zhu],[bing mofang weizao] jiang gei zai babilun de liang wei tianshi ha lu te he ma lu te de yixie dongxi. Mei dang ta lia [tianshi] jiaoshou renmen shi, ta lia bi shuo:“Women zhishi shiyan, yin'er bie bu xiangxin.” Yushi tamen jiu cong ta lia nali xuehuile lijian fuqi de fangfa. Wei jing an la xuke, tamen jue buneng yi ci shanghai renhe ren. Tamen xuehuile dui tamen youhai er wuyi de dongxi. Tamen que yi zhidao, shei goumai moshu, shei zai houshi jue wu fu fen. Tamen yi ci chumai ziji zhen kebei! Jiaru tamen zhidao.
Jiaru tamen xinyang bing jingwei, name, zai an la nali de hui ci shi zui hao de, jiaru tamen zhidao.

Xinshimen a! Nimen bie [dui mu sheng] shuo:“Ni renzhen ting women suo yan, women ye renzhen ting ni suo yan”, nimen dang shuo:“Rang women lijie ba!” Nimen dang tingcong. Bu xinyang zhe bi shou tongku de xingfa.
You jing ren he bai ouxiang zhe zhong de bu xinyang zhe dou bu xiwang nimen de zhu jiang gei nimen renhe haoshi, dan an la ba ta de enhui te ciyu tasuo yiyu zhe. An la shi you zhongda enhui de zhu.
